product_name: Thule Vertex XT Swing 4 Bike Hitch Rack
long_description: This 4-bike hitch makes loading and unloading a breeze, while improved ground clearance and space offers safer transport for your bikes. Plus, the swing design allows trunk access while fully loaded.
short_description: This 4-bike hitch makes loading and unloading a breeze, while improved ground clearance and space offers safer transport for your bikes. Plus, the swing design allows trunk access while fully loaded.
